stratagem.description: Specify a stratagem which gets unlocked when this objective is active.

disable_stratagem_when_used.description: [bool]If set, will disable the stratagem once it has been used fully.

unique_stratagem.description: [bool]Makes the given stratagem be unique - e.g. only give the player this stratagem if they don't already have it.

stratagem_glow_after_first_use.description: [bool]If set, the stratagem will glow anytime it is available, otherwise that will be disabled after the first use.

control_stratagem_uses.description: [bool]If set, this objective will control the stratagem uses for the stratagem.

area_of_interest_min_radius.description: If the area of interest is shown, specify the minimum radius of the circle to be shown using a larger radius means that the players will potentially have to search a wider area.

hidden_search_radius.description: Radius the objective is hidden under on the map if hidden

hide_on_insertion_map.description: [bool]Should the objective icon be hidden on the insertion (drop selection) map?

link_area.description: The area where we will search for units of specified type to link up with.

linked_unit_types.description: Settings for the objective units we will automatically link up to.

extraction_unlock_stage.description: The stage number that unlocks extraction. Default is -1, which means the last stage.

linked_unit_fail_out_of_bounds_timer.description: If a unit is out of bounds that is linked

hide_from_map_on_completion.description: [bool]If true then this objective is hidden once it is completed from the map. Good for delivery objectives where the objective ends up off the map

hidden_info_message.description: [string]Message displayed when in objective range, but objective have not being discovered yet.

on_complete_npc_dialog_event_trigger.description: [string]When objective is completed, trigger this npc dialog event (mostly for tutorial)

sequential.description: [bool]If true then the objective is only active if the previous objectives of the same type have been completed (or failed?).

start_inactive.description: [bool]If true then the objective will start inactive.

hide_from_ui_if_inactive.description: [bool]If true then this objective is hidden from the UI when inactive

base_counts_per_difficulty.description: For objectives such as kill/horde, this is the base counts for each difficulty to use

tiers.description: For tiered objectives, where you can be rewarded for partial progress if reaching certain milestones

info_range.description: If the player is within this range, the objective info will show up on the HUD. If set to -1, will default to stamp range.

always_show_info_on_hud_when_in_range.description: [bool]Default behavior is that info is only shown for the closest objective that is in range - This will force it to always show info for this objective, if it is in range.

allow_stratagem_use_after_completion.description: [bool]If true then stratagems used in this objective will be available after completing the objective.

can_be_completed_partially.description: [bool]If true then the objective can reward partial rewards based on current_step_count/total_step_count.

count_linked_steps.description: [bool]If set, the current/total steps of linked units will be taken into account for the progression objective.
